caption: Bagels were very fresh and soft.  You could eat them as is. Variety of flavors made it easy for everyone to have their preference. Our out of town guests were so happy to take a dozen to go.

I would give 0 stars if I could. I never received my delivery order and when I called asking about it, they said I was lying and that they wouldn’t be refunding me or re making it!! TERRIBLE SERVICE AND RUDE PEOPLE. Don’t eat here.
Amazing, fluffy bagels done the correct way (with minimal hole). Sandwich options I've enjoyed were all fantastic. Am a big fan of this establishment
Lovely place, awesome bagels
They are good but pricey.

This is my favorite place to get coffee / bagels in all of Brooklyn. They are generous with sandwich ingredients & the staff are all just great people. I go here to get lunch almost every day. (Also their bodega cat, Everything Bagel, is adorable and very friendly!)

Horrible customer services the woman on the phone was unprofessional, food was cold, eggs undercooked(yes it is possible) bacon was raw, toast dry...…. never order form this place especially fi they change their name often. Also just to add the driver is a drug dealer, the entire car reeked of marijuana
Great breakfast spot

HORRIBLE place! If you wish to start your morning well never go to this place! I walked in to buy a coffee, 5 different workers were sending me from one to another from different sides of the cafe for 10 minutes, no one knew what they were doing, super rude, not knowledgeable staff!I got late for work and eventually never got my coffee from them,never visit again! Very sorry I can not put -10 stars!
Very rude people. The delivery was over an hour late. The Lox Bagel sandwich is disgusting. NEVER GONNA ORDER FROM THIS SHITY PLACE AGAIN.
It’s a great shop the bagels there are the best and all the other cookies Stuff like that!
(Translated by Google) I like attention  (Original) Me gusta  la atención
Delicious food and friendly workers
Nice neighborhood coffee/ sandwich/ fresh juice shop
I call their bagel "steak bagels" because they are so meaty!!
Horrible customer service the worst grilled cheese of my life
super nice and fairly priced delicious food

I thought the whole new york bagels myth was a joke. These bagels were made fresh... They were gooey yet firm and full of flavor. The staff was very nice. I had just a plain bagel for ride back to LGA the last day but my downtown style bagel with chicken with awesome. The beet juice for hypertension was really good too. It was nice to not have sweet juices like the big companies bottle up. The history of the bagels on the wall was super interesting and appreciated too.
Friendly staff and good food. Small with a few tables to sit and eat.
Cool
The Breakfast I got from here was Amazing ! Business was clean & customer service was great 👍🏾 thank you guys !
Really good smoothies
The food is good and the delivery is very fast to my job.
Delicious bagels
Great bagels good prices, go there if you want a quick lunch for a good price
Nice variety of food item. Much more than bagels. Also offer sandwiches, salads, smoothies, and several other choices. Very friendly staff and reasonable prices.
Good bagels, good coffee, friendly staff, great location - get your coffee and hop on the train.
Gave my order 2 someone else who KNEW he didn't order that cause his order WAS TOTALLY DIFFERENT
Good food fresh everyday
Great, affordable salads, fresh bagels, great prices and quick service -- no complaints!
Big fluffy, chewy bagels. No nonsense, does one thing and does it right type of place. Seems like it's been there forever and will never go away.
Love this little place

First time here and I was impressed. Cinnamon Raisin bagel cooked perfect, not that many bagel places left in Brooklyn that still have soft bagels that are delicious. Also the staff their are extremely respectful and polite.
Very solid bagel/ sandwich shop. Worth a visit for breakfast or lunch
Very familiar. It is nice

Wouldn't waste my time or taste buds. Bagels were a disappoinment. Friendly, but incompetent staff. Widely over priced. If you want decent food, mainly breakfast on the go I'd walk a bit further to Smith St Bagels. Front my exploration that's the best spot in the neighborhood. Bagels by the park takes advantage of a location near the subway without providing that could be classes as a low average
I've been spoiled by this bagel joint. Nothing better than their fresh out the oven bagel with cream cheese. I go for the bagels and stay for the smell of more bagels.

LOVE this place- just started working around the corner and it’s become my new spot to grab a bite before work. Bagels are excellent, service is fast and friendly, what more could you want? Nothing like having a reliable bagel shop for cheap, fast, delicious, filling food. The employees are amazing- hard to find such good service these days!

I absolutely LOVE Bagels By The Park! It is my go-to when I’m at work. Prices are fair, delivery is super fast, food is always fresh and delicious. They listen to your special instructions and seem to really care that their customers are happy and satisfied. They easily have the best egg & cheese in Brooklyn! I order from them sometimes 5 times a week and I’m ALWAYS happy with my food. Their whole wheat croissants are TO DIE FOR! Their coffee is also amazing.
yum yum yummy classic New York bagels good coffee  and delicious sandwiches . try the roasted turkey club!!!! yum yum yummy yum
The customer service is amazing. Fresh bagels and coffee. Variety of cream cheeses and other pasteries
Great
Bagels are great! Atmosphere and seating kind of sucks
Good bagels but hit or miss service
fast and good service overshadowed by overpriced bagels.
Thanks Jimmy !

I had a delicious spinach salad here of sundried tomatoes, red pepper, capers and feta with balsamic vinegar and olive oil. It was huge and only $8. I also enjoyed a fresh juice, the carrot-beet-spinach. I love having a lunch so healthy that I am buzzing from all the vitamins and that is also satisfying and inexpensive. What a great place.
Amazing food!  Seriously can't get bagels like this at home.
Pretty delicious and quick-service. Coffee here is fresh and is pretty good.
Quick and friendly service!  Great bagel and lox.  Very delicious!
This place is the essence of Carroll Gardens. The Chocolate raspberry coffee is amazing. Friendly neighborhood vibe. Hope things stay this way.
Several staff, including the servers and the cashier, were really rude and didn’t even give me the sandwich I asked for after taking it away to amend the order.
Good service, Great bagels better ingredients
Good bagels and muffins.
They have so many great choices for sandwiches and they are very friendly about making changes. Their cookies are also delicious!

Really 2.5 stars.  Food: solid.  Service: I don't want to blame the workers here, they're extremely nice, but this is most poorly run bagel shop I've ever gone in.  High chance they don't get your order right on top of a 15 minutes post bagel order wait.

This is the best value / quality bagel in the neighborhood. Good price / fast service. If you are going to get something besides a bagel (like a plate of eggs) you are better off ordering it ahead of time or ordering on seamless.
Decent customer service (but not always very social/pleasant) , good bagels, vegan cream cheese options, their regular coffee tastes like dirty water, unfortunately and they are a little expensive.
Best bagels in town!

It makes no sense that a customer cannot come in and buy a bagel and beverage for themselves and not pay with a credit/debit card. The minimum is $8. It is really annoying that they are a bagel shop, yet you can't buy just a bagel.

It's ok but way over priced and the cashiers are horribly rude and condescending. I've been hung up on a few times for mistakes on their part. Don't go there much these days. I can get my side of bitchiness at home
Amazing bagels great price superb choice of everything.
Great food but they're a bit cranky in the morning :p

everytime i order from here its a horrible experience.its not the food, its the lady who takes the order in the evening is bringing this place down. i order the same thing once a week and she can never seem to get things right. then when i call back for the forgotten item she kept hanging up on me.her attitude is the worst i've heard over a phone and she seems so bothered by taking a order. When i asked to speak to the owner that set her staright. sucks i had to be a dick to get what i oreded. i gave the delivery boy another tip becasue of her fault. she needs to be removed if my company is ordering from here again.

I ordered from here through GrubHub and chose to pay with cash. I had an order that was $7 and change but I only had a $10. I expected them to charge me $8 as to not deal with change and I was going to tip $1. But, when the delivery guy came he was 1) at the wrong house and 2) he insisted that he had no change. I'm no cheap-o, but I didn't need to pay a 30% tip for a wrap. I called the restaurant and the rude woman who answered was condescending and called me "sweetie" and asked me "what do you want me to do". I called them purely as a courtesy to let them know that their delivery man had no change and that this affected my view on their restaurant. And now, I have no inclination to return. So, GrubHubbers with cash, be forewarned. Their cheating and rude people. I've had a rude encounter with them in person, which I let slide, because maybe the girl was having a bad day. But this is twice now.

Been coming here my whole life growing up in Carroll Gardens. I miss it like crazy now that I live in Boston. I can't stand the people that complain about the service here. They are all rich yuppie a-holes and hipster douchebags that have completely changed my neighborhood.  All they do is complain and don't realize how good they have it living in the best part of New York City.  Best bagels and wraps you can get in Carroll gardens. First thing I do when I come home is go here and on other and everything bagel with scallion cream cheese and tomatoes.
